name: zendframework/zend-expressive
description: PSR-7 Middleware Microframework based on Stratigility

suggest.league/plates: ^3.1 to use the Plates template adapter
suggest.nikic/fast-route: ^0.6.0 to use the FastRoute routing adapter
suggest.zendframework/zend-mvc: ^2.5 to use the zend-mvc TreeRouteStack routing adapter
suggest.zendframework/zend-psr7bridge: ^0.1.0 to use the zend-mvc TreeRouteStack routing adapter
suggest.twig/twig: ^1.19 to use the Twig template adapter
suggest.zendframework/zend-view: ^2.5 to use the Zend View template adapter
